channel.title: Comments on: Corona Geek Speak – Converting Color Codes for Graphics 2.0

item.title: By: Jen Looper
item.dc:creator: Jen Looper
item.description: That's a great resource, thanks for sharing!
item.content:encoded: That’s a great resource, thanks for sharing!

item.title: By: Pierre
item.dc:creator: Pierre
item.description: I found that idea on a MacUpdate forum: Go to /Applications/Utilities/DigitalColor Meter.app Goto menu view/display values/as percent
item.content:encoded:
I found that idea on a MacUpdate forum:
Go to /Applications/Utilities/DigitalColor Meter.app
Goto menu view/display values/as percent

item.title: By: Jen Looper
item.dc:creator: Jen Looper
item.description: I kept saying that RGB color decimals are 0-225, I meant to say 0-255. Sorry! For more color scripts, you can visit my blog at http://www.ladeezfirstmedia.com/ and take a look at the comments: http://www.ladeezfirstmedia.com/2013/11/21/tutorial-what-to-do-about-colors-in-the-new-corona-sdk-graphics-2-0-public-release/
item.content:encoded: I kept saying that RGB color decimals are 0-225, I meant to say 0-255. Sorry! For more color scripts, you can visit my blog at http://www.ladeezfirstmedia.com/ and take a look at the comments: http://www.ladeezfirstmedia.com/2013/11/21/tutorial-what-to-do-about-colors-in-the-new-corona-sdk-graphics-2-0-public-release/
